short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your background with the image of a small house nestled in the midst of majestic snowy mountains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your background with the image of a small house nestled in the midst of majestic snowy mountains. The humble house stands out against the pristine white snow, evoking a sense of peace and tranquility amidst the wild nature. This scene brings warmth and serenity, creating a relaxing and calm workspace for you.
